content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous. The sentiment should be positive or negative or neutral.
I recently received my order for testosterone. The box was well packed and nothing was missing. It gave me confidence that the product quality would be good too.

I recently received my package of NAD and estrogen injectables. The NAD was not very effective. I probably won't order it again. The estrogen was great though. My order number is #8675309 shipped by Fedex. The box was well packed and nothing was missing. It gave me confidence that the product quality would be good too.
